thread.title: George W. Bush shows off shirt at SMU game
thread.title_full: George W. Bush shows off shirt at SMU game

title: George W. Bush shows off shirt at SMU game
text:
George W. Bush shows off shirt at SMU game SMU's "The Mob" has a new member. Post to Facebook George W. Bush shows off shirt at SMU game SMU's "The Mob" has a new member.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/former-president-george-w-bush-spent-smu-basketball-cincinnati/   George W. Bush shows off shirt at SMU game Andrew Joseph 6:18   
Former President George W. Bush opens his jacket to show off a t-shirt during the first half of an NCAA college basketball game between Cincinnati and SMU in Dallas, Sunday, Feb. 12, 2017. (Photo: AP) 
Former President George W. Bush was on hand for SMU's game agains No. 11 Cincinnati, and oh, did he have a great time. 
As Bush was recognized at his courtside seat, the former president revealed a his very own "The Mob" student section shirt. A new member of "The Mob" revealed himself today pic.twitter.com/VwmAUlRmji — American MBB (@American_MBB) February 12, 2017 
He showed off the shirt during the first media timeout to the delight of the crowd at Moody Coliseum. Former President George W. Bush and First Lady Laura are courtside. W flashed this shirt during the first timeout. Crowd was very pleased. pic.twitter.com/97ZlNnXblN — Ben Baby (@Ben_Baby) February 12, 2017 
SMU would go on to win 60-51. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/former-president-george-w-bush-spent-smu-basketball-cincinnati/ Most Popular
